subtitle: A ratatouile-style one-pot vegetarian dish full of healthy goodness.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Add the onion and garlic. Fry for 1-2 min until softened slightly.
Add the aubergine and tomatoes. Cook for 10 min.
Meanwhile, place the pasta in a small pan of boiling water. Bring to the boil and simmer for 4-5 min until tender, or according to pack instructions. Drain well.
Add the beans, courgettes, stock, pesto and seasoning with the pasta. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 15 min until vegetables are tender. Serve.

title: Mediterranean minestrone style casserole
